dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Stop, STOP!
The one seated opposite the child shouted indignantly. The child stopped just as she was about to chug the liquor straight from the bottle.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: H-huh? Wherefore hast thou shouted so...?

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: We are no mere peasants, Don Quixote. We do *not* drink straight from a bottle.
The other child, furious and frustrated, sighed deeply and shut her eyes with exasperation.

They were members of the Blade Lineage on the run... but as soon as they clear their names, as soon as they can return to S Corp... they will be taking jobs as personal guards of the high-ranking officials.

And that meant that they would have to know high society etiquette by heart in case they had to join them for a meal. The other child's head began to fill with all kinds of terrible faux pas shenanigans that this child would put herself into.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: One must drink from a cup, not the bottle. That is the proper drinking etiquette.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Once the cup is empty, and only when it is empty do you refill it for another drink.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... Yet... wherefore?
The child looks back with a genuinely puzzled expression.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: 'Tis more work for the same amount of alcohol, is it not? To drink from such a petite bowl...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... It is to prevent one from getting completely intoxicated while maintaining compo—

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Guugh! Cough, cough!
Whatever the other child said, it didn't register in this one.
The child began chugging straight from the bottle...
Perhaps it was the unexpected flavor, perhaps it was the piercing aroma. Or maybe it was just that strong of a liquor.
... She immediately expelled the entirety of the bottle's contents like a fountain spray.
It need not be said that the lecturing child was completely showered in whatever burst forth from the child's mouth.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: I-I...! 'Twas not mine intention to—

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: The flavor was... simply too different from what I'd...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... 'Tis made of rice, is it not? I had thought with quite the confidence that its flavor would be no different from that of sikhye or gamju...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: What did I say? What did I just say?

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Eek!

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: I just told you to drink from the cup, little by little.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: If you had listened, this would not have happened.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: I-I mean...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Speak properly! Though we may be of the same rank, at this precise moment I am your instructor and superior! You will do well to address me as one!

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Y-yes ma'am!

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: First! You are wielding your chopsticks in a manner most improper!

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Uh, this was merely to free my other hand for the bottle—

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Behold! This! Is how you properly wield a chopstick! Your sloppy technique is a disgrace...
... The other child's lecture continued without end.
At this point, it was starting to sound like she was just unloading all of her frustrations on the child for the sake of unloading them, but...
... it *was* the child's fault, no? Actions do have consequences.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... And I will leave it at that.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Agh...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Have you completed your reconnaissance? I have been waiting many days to hear your reports.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Ahm. I have discovered in my journeys about five different respectable locations in the Backstreets.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Hm, that is good news indeed. Yet I must also inquire you about Kurokumo Clan's—

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Ahem! Worry not thy heart! I have spied on the Kurokumo Clan curs as they dined!

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... 'Tis in two days.
The liquor in the other child's cup rippled as her hand twitched ever-so-slightly.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Indeed... A match catches fire when struck.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Yet we must survive. Persist. And one day... we will find ourselves an opportunity. That is what our mentor has told us.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: You have done well, Don Quixote. Venturing so deep into enemy territory...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: Heheh, a handful of them did notice my trail...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage Salsu
dataList.content: ... But they have all been taken care of.
The child held up her blade and spoke casually. It was spoken with the same casual cadence as though she had just swatted a few specks of dust from her cloak.
Though they may not have started out as members of a Syndicate wandering the Backstreets, the reason the members of Blade Lineage have no hesitation in cutting people down...
... is that they have all each been slayers for a long time. Blade Lineage or not.
Yet, there is a difference.
That the blade they used to wield in service of others... is now for no one else but their own.
